text: David Archuleta is the first album released by runner-up of Season 8 of American Idol, David Archuleta. The studio album includes the songs "Crush", and "A Little Too Not Over You". == Original Track Listing == # "Crush" # "Touch My Hand" # "Barriers" # "My Hands" # "A Little Too Not Over You" # "You Can" # "Running" # "Desperate" # "To Be With You" # "Don't Let Go" # "Your Eyes Don't Lie" # "Angels" === iTunes Deluxe Edition Tracks === # "Waiting for Yesterday" # "Falling" # "Let Me Go" # "Somebody Out There" === Wal-Mart Bonus Tracks === # "Works For Me!" category:2008 albums Category:Debut albums Category:pop albums category:R&B; albums
title: David Archuleta (album)
